resources.string: Tired of the government? Dunno who to vote cuz.. YOLO who cares about politics? No stress, just Frogify yourself and get the chance to see your new King!
Bonus Content: The developer after a week of Java...
The Hypno Toad King orders you to spend your life catching mosquitos and flies! Fulfill your Destiny young padaw...ehm, toa...ehm, frog!
